project.name: MMGet
project.description: Application to export a (dynamic MMBase) website to a static version of it. Install the jar in your 'WEB-INF/lib' directory. It has a component: put 'blocks/index.jspx' in '/mmbase/components/mmget/index.jspx' of your webapp. Open the MMBase admin pages, you'll find it in the section 'Tools'.
